title: Cloud Expo New York
desc: The World's Largest Cloud Computing Event, June 7-9, 2016  at the Javits Center! Cloud computing budgets worldwide are reaching into the hundreds of billions of dollars, and no organization can survive long without some sort of cloud migration strategy. Each month brings new announcements, use cases, and success stories.? Cloud Expo New York presents: Cloud Expo  offers the world's most comprehensive selection of technical and strategic Industry Keynotes, General Sessions, Breakout Sessions, and signature Power Panels. The exhibition floor features 100+ exhibitors offering specific solutions and comprehensive strategies.?    The floor also features a Demo Theater that give delegates the opportunity to get even closer to the technology they want to see and the people who offer it.?    Attend Cloud Expo. Create your own custom experience. Learn the latest from the world's best technologists. Talk to the vendors you are considering, and put them to the test.?     See you in New York City!
